name: image_classification
description: Classify images into predefined categories using deep learning models. Supports various architectures including ResNet, VGG, and EfficientNet. Processes single images or batches with configurable input sizes. Suitable for object recognition, scene understanding, and content moderation tasks.

name: text_summarization
description: Generate concise summaries of long text documents while preserving key information. Supports extractive and abstractive summarization methods. Handles documents of varying lengths from paragraphs to full articles. Useful for document processing and information extraction.

name: image_captioning
description: Generate natural language descriptions of image content. Combines computer vision and natural language processing to produce human-readable captions. Supports multiple caption styles and detail levels.

name: object_detection
description: Detect and localize multiple objects within images. Identifies object classes and their bounding box coordinates. Supports real-time detection and batch processing modes for common objects, people, and vehicles.

name: machine_translation
description: Translate text between multiple languages with high accuracy. Supports neural machine translation models trained on diverse language pairs. Handles sentence-level and document-level translation across 50+ language pairs.

name: super_resolution
description: Enhance image resolution and quality using deep learning techniques. Upscales low-resolution images while preserving and enhancing details. Supports various upscaling factors and quality settings. Ideal for improving image clarity in photography and surveillance.

name: visual_question_answering
description: Answer natural language questions about image content. Combines vision and language understanding to provide accurate answers. Supports open-ended and multiple-choice question formats.
